thread.title: How Facebook Makes So Much Money

author: Dan Gallagher
title: How Facebook Makes So Much Money
text:
Mark Zuckerberg will be doing a lot of apologizing in Washington this week, though he probably won’t say much about an important number for investors—the company’s fat operating margins.
And yet, the speed and efficiency with which Facebook has become a hugely profitable advertising powerhouse is an important undercurrent to the company’s latest troubles.
